languages.text: {n}Женщина разочарованно качает головой.{/n} "Как жаль, как жаль... что ж, благодарю вас за вашу помощь. Мои люди доставят обещанное вознаграждение на ваш корабль. Если же вы передумаете, то место встречи то же, что и в прошлый раз. До свидания, шерин".

traits.locale_text: {n}Женщина разочарованно качает головой.{/n} "Как жаль, как жаль... что ж, благодарю вас за вашу помощь. Мои люди доставят обещанное вознаграждение на ваш корабль. Если же вы передумаете, то место встречи то же, что и в прошлый раз. До свидания, шерин".

languages.text: {n}She shakes her head in disappointment.{/n} "That's too bad... Too bad. Well then, I thank you for your help. My people will deliver the promised reward to your ship. If you happen to reconsider, you'll find me at the same spot. Goodbye, shereen."
languages.original_text: {n}Женщина разочарованно качает головой.{/n} "Как жаль, как жаль... что ж, благодарю вас за вашу помощь. Мои люди доставят обещанное вознаграждение на ваш корабль. Если же вы передумаете, то место встречи то же, что и в прошлый раз. До свидания, шерин".

traits.locale_text: {n}She shakes her head in disappointment.{/n} "Sad to hear it... well then, I thank you for your help. My people will deliver the promised reward to your ship. If you happen to reconsider, you'll find me at the same spot. Goodbye, shereen."

{n}She shakes her head in disappointment.{/n} "Sad to hear it... well then, I thank you for your help. My people will deliver the promised reward to your ship. If you happen to reconsider, you'll find me at the same spot. Goodbye, shereen."

{n}She shakes her head in disappointment.{/n} "That's too bad... Too bad. Well then, I thank you for your help. My people will deliver the promised reward to your ship. If you happen to reconsider, you'll find me at the same spot. Goodbye, shereen."

{n}She shakes her head in disappointment.{/n} "That's too bad... Too bad. Well then, I thank you for your help. My people will deliver the promised reward to your ship. If you happen to reconsider, you'll find me at the same spot. Goodbye, shereen."

{n}She shakes her head in disappointment.{/n} "That's too bad... Too bad. Well then, I thank you for your help. My people will deliver the promised reward to your ship. If you happen to reconsider, you'll find me at the same spot. Goodbye, shereen."

languages.text: {n}她失望地摇了摇头。{/n}“这真是太糟糕了……太糟糕了。好吧，我感谢你的协助。我的人会把我们说好的酬劳送到你的船上。如果你碰巧改了主意的话，你还是可以去老地方找我。再见了，亲爱的。”
languages.original_text: {n}She shakes her head in disappointment.{/n} "That's too bad... Too bad. Well then, I thank you for your help. My people will deliver the promised reward to your ship. If you happen to reconsider, you'll find me at the same spot. Goodbye, shereen."

traits.locale_text: {n}她失望地摇了摇头。{/n}“这真是太糟糕了……太糟糕了。好吧，我感谢你的协助。我的人会把我们说好的酬劳送到你的船上。如果你碰巧改了主意的话，你还是可以去老地方找我。再见了，亲爱的。”

languages.text: {n}Decepcionada, niega con la cabeza.{/n} «Es una lástima... Una gran lástima. En cualquier caso, le agradezco la ayuda. Los míos llevarán la recompensa que prometimos a su nave. Si cambia de opinión, estaré aquí mismo. Adiós, shereen».
languages.original_text: {n}She shakes her head in disappointment.{/n} "That's too bad... Too bad. Well then, I thank you for your help. My people will deliver the promised reward to your ship. If you happen to reconsider, you'll find me at the same spot. Goodbye, shereen."

traits.locale_text: {n}Decepcionada, niega con la cabeza.{/n} «Es una lástima... Una gran lástima. En cualquier caso, le agradezco la ayuda. Los míos llevarán la recompensa que prometimos a su nave. Si cambia de opinión, estaré aquí mismo. Adiós, shereen».

languages.text: {n}ジェイは残念そうに頭を振る。{/n}「残念…残念だよ。それじゃ、手伝ってくれてどうもね。あたしの仲間が約束の報酬をアンタの船に届けるよ。もしアンタが考え直したら、同じ場所で会えるさ。じゃあね、シャリーン」
languages.original_text: {n}She shakes her head in disappointment.{/n} "That's too bad... Too bad. Well then, I thank you for your help. My people will deliver the promised reward to your ship. If you happen to reconsider, you'll find me at the same spot. Goodbye, shereen."

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイは残念そうに頭を振る。{/n}「残念…残念だよ。それじゃ、手伝ってくれてどうもね。あたしの仲間が約束の報酬をアンタの船に届けるよ。もしアンタが考え直したら、同じ場所で会えるさ。じゃあね、シャリーン」

languages.text: {n}Sie schüttelt enttäuscht den Kopf.{/n} "Das ist sehr schade ... Sehr schade. Gut, dann danke ich Euch für Eure Hilfe. Meine Leute werden die versprochene Belohnung zu Eurem Schiff liefern. Falls Ihr Eure Meinung ändert, findet Ihr mich am selben Ort. Lebt wohl, Shereen!"
languages.original_text: {n}She shakes her head in disappointment.{/n} "That's too bad... Too bad. Well then, I thank you for your help. My people will deliver the promised reward to your ship. If you happen to reconsider, you'll find me at the same spot. Goodbye, shereen."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sie schüttelt enttäuscht den Kopf.{/n} "Das ist sehr schade ... Sehr schade. Gut, dann danke ich Euch für Eure Hilfe. Meine Leute werden die versprochene Belohnung zu Eurem Schiff liefern. Falls Ihr Eure Meinung ändert, findet Ihr mich am selben Ort. Lebt wohl, Shereen!"

languages.text: {n}Elle secoue la tête, déçue.{/n} « Quel malheur... C'est vraiment dommage. Eh bien dans ce cas, merci pour votre aide. Mon équipe va apporter la récompense promise à votre vaisseau. Si jamais vous changez d'avis, vous savez où me trouver. Au revoir, shereen. »
languages.original_text: {n}She shakes her head in disappointment.{/n} "That's too bad... Too bad. Well then, I thank you for your help. My people will deliver the promised reward to your ship. If you happen to reconsider, you'll find me at the same spot. Goodbye, shereen."

traits.locale_text: {n}Elle secoue la tête, déçue.{/n} « Quel malheur... C'est vraiment dommage. Eh bien dans ce cas, merci pour votre aide. Mon équipe va apporter la récompense promise à votre vaisseau. Si jamais vous changez d'avis, vous savez où me trouver. Au revoir, shereen. »

languages.text: {n}Hayal kırıklığıyla başını sallıyor.{/n} "Yazık oldu. Çok yazık... Peki o zaman, yardımın için teşekkür ederim. Adamlarım, anlaştığımız ödülü gemine gönderecek. Fikrin değişirse ben buralardayım. Hoşça kal şirinim."
languages.original_text: {n}She shakes her head in disappointment.{/n} "That's too bad... Too bad. Well then, I thank you for your help. My people will deliver the promised reward to your ship. If you happen to reconsider, you'll find me at the same spot. Goodbye, shereen."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hayal kırıklığıyla başını sallıyor.{/n} "Yazık oldu. Çok yazık... Peki o zaman, yardımın için teşekkür ederim. Benimkiler anlaştığımız ödülü gemine gönderecek. Fikrin değişirse ben buralardayım. Hoşça kal şirinim."
